intro: Psychotria tutuilensis, commonly known as the Tuluwai psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria tutuilensis is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
